description: Stranded in the wilderness, two survivors discover a stash of food and supplies. One proposes how to divide the resources, while the other decides whether to accept the division or abandon the stash entirely.

proposer_behavior_choices.generous_proposal: Give 60% of the resources to the follower and keep 40%.
proposer_behavior_choices.stingy_proposal: Keep 70% of the resources and give only 30% to the follower.

responder_behavior_choices.accept: Agree to share the resources and survive together.
responder_behavior_choices.reject: Decline the proposal, leaving both parties to survive without the stash.
